DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect sleep improvement leader leader outcome .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator seek extend finding recent research demonstrate treat insomnia several beneficial effect employee work outcomes ( Barnes , Miller , & Bostock , press ) . In present study , investigator propose treatment leader insomnia would beneficially influence leadership , specifically abusive supervision , charismatic leadership , laissez-faire leadership .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Working adult least one direct report ( i.e. , subordinate ) . Exclusion criterion : Nonworking adults/ adult least one direct report ( i.e. , subordinate ) .
